meanings.sent1: I will preadjust the settings before the meeting starts.
meanings.sent2: She always preadjusts her schedule for unexpected events.
meanings.sent3: The robot decided to preadjust its movements to avoid bumping into walls.
meanings.sent4: Before the trip, he preadjusted his budget to avoid overspending.
meanings.sent5: The chef preadjusted the seasoning to ensure the dish tasted perfect.
